caption.title: Estimated proportion of B CAR and B PANDEMIC clades among HIV-1 subtype B infected individuals from different Brazilian states.
caption.p: The total number of sequences analyzed in each locality is indicated. States were colored according to the Brazilian region of origin as indicated in the legend at bottom, with exception of those states with no HIV-1 sequences included in this study (white). Map was created from a template obtained from d-maps.com ( http://d-maps.com/carte.php?numcar=4843&lang=en).
